name: pickle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a vegetable or fruit in vinegar or in salty water, especially a cucumber: Have some pickles with your sandwich. a sweet/sour pickle
BRETT STEVENS/Cultura/GettyImages
[ U ] UK a sauce made from vegetables in vinegar with spices added: cheese and pickle sandwiches
More examplesFewer examples Usually I crave something sour like a pickle instead of cookies.Fresh pickles are prepared using boiling-water processing and vinegar and salt as preserving agents.The company produces 28 million jars of pickle a year.
